Art Exhibitions -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charaf. Exhibition at Contact Art Gallery, Hamra, on 12 February 1974. [Painting reproduced on poster by] Rafic Charaf 1973, "“North Plains, Baalbeck” 1974, State award.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Charaf : 1973 State Award
